description:
At the end of my course, students will be able to:

Build a basic Web UI automation test framework by using Selenium WebDriver, JUnit, Maven.

Who should take this course?

This course is for you if you are an experienced Software QA who is familiar with Web UI manual test but not familiar with automation test. And you are looking for a quick start with Selenium WebDriver.

Who should not?

This course is probably not for you if you are looking for advanced Selenium WebDriver automation framework topics.

What will students need to know or do before starting the course?

Install Java SDK version 1.8+ in Mac OSX version 10.9+ (Mavericks or above).
title: Selenium自动化测试快速入门指南
